char* util_block_get_offset_ptr (  const object *  o,
const char *  name,
int  occurence
) 
 

get pointer to offset value in object symbols 

 object example[] =
 {
     "name", "example", "",
     ".text", "12345678901234567890", "20",
     "!SYM_CALL", "dest()", ".text+0x10",
     "!SYM_CALL", "dest2()", ".text",
     NULL
 }
 util_block_get_offset_ptr ( example, "!SYM_CALL", 0 ); // => returns ".text+0x10"
 util_block_get_offset_ptr ( example, "!SYM_CALL", 1 ); // => returns ".text"
Returns:
pointer to offset data or NULL (error)
Parameters:
occurence the occurence'th occurence
o the object
name the destination or code to patch; generally: the 2nd parameter in a tripplet :)
